hypothesis_content.title: BTC Momentum Breakout Follow-Through After Neutral Regime Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within a 3% range for 5 consecutive days during a NEUTRAL regime, a daily close above the consolidation high triggers a momentum move where BTC outperforms the median altcoin (from approved list) over the next 3 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often represent compression before directional moves. A tight consolidation followed by a breakout suggests accumulation and a shift in momentum. BTC typically leads altcoin rallies; this hypothesis bets on BTC strength relative to mid-cap alts post-breakout.
entry_conditions: Simultaneously go long BTC, short equal-dollar-basket of AVAX, SOL, DOGE, PEPE, GRT

exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price closes below the 5-day consolidation low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median altcoin basket return > BTC return over the 3-day window following the breakout signal.
